description: When Alex said ?I love to hold the back of her head on my dick while I shoot down her throat,? in his bio, I knew I was in for a good time. Some guys get so tongue tied on camera but listening to Alex was like hearing a very hot bedstime story that was definielty too much for cable.Here's a guy who simply loves women. He knows exactly how to please them to ensure he gets what he wants in return. He has an incredible sexual appetite and has tried just about everything. Doing a video, however, was the few things left on his list to try.I'm damn glad I was the lucky one who got to make that happen.  When you see him work that hard pole and the expression on his face when he finally lets his load free, you'll be glad too!
title: Straight To The Point, Scene #02
